title: State v. Gary Mitchum Reeves – Episode 9 – Through a Window, Darkly
description:
September 4, 2017 / After Gary's case was on Inside Edition, people who thought they knew things about the case started calling in. They'd heard talk, they told him, and they thought they knew who was responsible for the murder.

(Photo: Pictures of kitchen and back porch of the Maple Street house)

Episode scoring music by AnimalWeapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

Thank you to our sponsor, Casper! 

Special offer for our listeners includes $50 toward any mattress purchase by visiting www.casper.com/undisclosed and using promo code undisclosed. 

#undisclosed #garymitchumreeves
